net: usb: ax88179_178a: Fix packet receiving

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.129 by commit c0a28f2ddf9a76cd6d94714a44bb25e120885e26, it was introduced in version v5.10.101 by commit 758290defe93a865a2880d10c5d5abd288b64b5d. For more details please see the references link.
